array.string: If you set the touched graphic’s `alpha` value to something like 0.25, the graphic will be almost transparent.
Use an `if` statement with the `<` operator to check if `graphic.alpha` is less than 1.

dict.string: `//➤ Modify alpha.`\ `if graphic.alpha < 1.0 {`\ ` graphic.alpha = 1.0`\ `} else {`\ ` graphic.alpha = 0.25`\ `}`
